name: Robot Rampage (itch) (gamedalphin)
description:
Wreak havoc on humanity on your fearsome Robot Rampage!

This game was made in October 2022 as a project for my Intro to Game Development class. The project was to recreate a classic arcade game with a twist. I chose to recreate Rampage (1986) and add a throwing mechanic. I also chose a robot theme because frankly it was easier to draw.
